name: José Miguel Fernández
headline: Software Engineer | Java & Spring Boot | PHP | Docker | Microservices | SQL
summary: Passionate about building things that work fast, look clean, and scale well. I work mostly with Java & Spring Boot these days, but I’ve also spent years building large PHP platforms, improving architectures, and helping teams work smarter. I love learning new tech, understanding how systems fit together, and making complex stuff feel simple.

experience.description: Part of an international agile team responsible for the ongoing evolution of a backend platform undergoing long-term modernization. Contributing to architectural improvements, development standards, and collaboration across backend and frontend teams.
highlights: Built and evolved Spring Boot microservices with Spring Security and PostgreSQL to support a secure, scalable architecture.
Contributed to the migration from a Scala monolith to Spring Boot, improving maintainability and long-term extensibility.
Implemented database versioning and lifecycle automation with Liquibase to ensure consistency across environments.
Strengthened service reliability through automated testing with JUnit and contract testing using Pact.
Collaborated on a React-based React & TypeScript back office to streamline internal operations and improve usability.
Produced functional flow diagrams to align technical and non-technical stakeholders during platform evolution.

experience.description: Progressed from Trainee to Senior Software Developer while contributing to the design, development, and evolution of large-scale educational platforms used across multiple international markets.
highlights: Designed and evolved a Docker-based infrastructure to standardize environments, improve scalability, and boost team productivity.
Led the transformation to a multi-language, multi-portal platform, expanding international reach and supporting global growth.
Integrated new payment systems and implemented advanced search capabilities using Elasticsearch to enhance user experience.
Developed and maintained backend and frontend features using PHP (Phalcon), JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Improved platform performance, security, and Core Web Vitals through continuous optimization.
Established code review and collaboration practices to raise code quality and foster continuous improvement across the team.
